title: What Pet Should You Get?
description: Almost every kid wants a pet. But how do you decide which pet is best for you? This book introduces readers to the idea of "pros" and "cons," and helps readers to look at multiple perspectives and opinions. Engaging photographs of kids and pets support the text.
meta: boring, cage, con, decide, opinions, playmate, pro, research, weird
